execution_plan.description: Find users (from the chat database) with their message counts and return only those whose message count is above the overall average messages-per-user.
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.id AS s1__id, users.username AS s1__username, COUNT(messages.id) AS s1__message_count FROM users INNER JOIN messages ON users.id = messages.sended_by GROUP BY users.id, users.username HAVING COUNT(messages.id) > (SELECT AVG(user_count) FROM (SELECT COUNT(messages.id) AS user_count FROM messages GROUP BY messages.sended_by) AS sub);
